_source.text: A 95-yard touchdown run with shifty mid-field moves highlighted a 167-yard day against Texas, but Williams hurt his ankle two games later against Notre Dame and had just one 100-yard game and one game with better than 5 yards per carry the rest of the season - and both came in the regular-season finale against TCU, a week after he carried just seven times against Oklahoma State.
